background.intro_p1: Climate change is a core global issue. Science shows that our daily behaviorsâ€”commuting, diet, electricity useâ€”all accumulate carbon emissions. However, the public often finds it hard to understand "how much exactly am I emitting?" or "which habits have the biggest impact?".
background.intro_p2: We hope to build a platform that, through intuitive interfaces and automated mechanisms, guides users to see the possibilities for change and reflect on the environmental impact of their lifestyle.

dashboard.main_desc: CarbonTrace provides comprehensive tools to help you move from data awareness to action. Explore the features below to begin.

quick.title: Quick Estimate
quick.usage: For busy modern lives. Answer 3 simple lifestyle questions in 30 seconds to get an instant annual carbon overview.
quick.philosophy: We believe 'low barrier' is the first step to change. Build your carbon intuition without digging through bills.

detailed.title: Detailed Analysis
detailed.usage: Input precise data like electricity bills and mileage. The system uses the latest Taiwan coefficients to generate research-grade reports.
detailed.philosophy: Data is the cornerstone of change. Identify high-carbon hotspots hidden in life details through precise Life Cycle Assessment (LCA).

history.title: History Track
history.usage: Your digital eco-passbook. The system automatically saves every calculation result and plots long-term trend charts.
history.philosophy: Carbon reduction is not a momentary passion, but a long-term persistence. Seeing the downward trajectory is the greatest source of achievement.

regional.title: Regional Map
regional.usage: Big Data Dashboard. Explore the average carbon emissions of your city and compare them with the national average.
regional.philosophy: Connecting individuals and communities. Through geographic information, we see differences in urban energy structures and drive localized climate action.

quiz.title: Green Energy Quiz
quiz.usage: Randomly draw 10 quick questions on environmental knowledge. Challenge your green knowledge base and accumulate points.
quiz.philosophy: Knowledge is power. Through gamified learning, difficult energy knowledge becomes interesting and easy to absorb.

vision.title: Seeing the Invisible
vision.text: Carbon emissions are invisible, but their impact is real. CarbonTrace transforms abstract data into visualized charts, allowing you to truly 'see' your life's impact on the Earth.

action.title: From Data to Action
action.text: Knowing the numbers is just the first step. We provide customized reduction suggestions to help you make eco-friendly decisions without compromising quality of life.

impact.title: Gathering Small Forces
impact.text: One person's change may be small, but a group's persistence can change the world. We connect every reduction effort towards the 2050 Net Zero goal.
